commenter_a: I feel like the word "leggy" came up a lot in this article. As if the author was sorta fixated on this one thing about the girls who tormented her and swift in particular in a sorta Freudian way. Like, "The evil reign of Taylor Swift, with her forever legs, way too long to be street-legal, stretching between pencil skirts and slightly worn Converse, glossy in the pink-frosted Malibu dusk... Um, I mean, hen culture and mean girls and stuff." I don't necessarily disagree with what she's saying, but she is really, really aware of Taylor Swift's legs.
